According to another aspect of the present disclosure, the display device may further include a side portion which extends along a circumference of the plurality of reflective sheets and is disposed to be inclined toward the display panel with respect to the plurality of reflective sheets, wherein the side portion may include a reflective material.

According to another aspect of the present disclosure, the display device may further include a horizontal reflection sheet which extends in the length direction of the second plate and is located between the plurality of reflection sheets in the length direction of the first plate.
According to another aspect of the present disclosure, the display device may further include a connector mounted on a rear surface of the first plate.
The effect of the display device according to the present disclosure will be described as follows.
According to at least one of the embodiments of the present disclosure, it is possible to provide a display device capable of reducing manufacturing cost or process cost of a substrate.

According to at least one of the embodiments of the present disclosure, it is possible to provide a display device capable of easily coupling a substrate and a reflective sheet with respect to a frame.

According to at least one of the embodiments of the present disclosure, it is possible to provide a display device capable of providing a gap in consideration of thermal expansion of a plurality of substrates.
According to at least one of the embodiments of the present disclosure, it is possible to provide a display device capable of minimizing formation of dark portion between a plurality of substrates.

Certain embodiments or other embodiments of the invention described above are not mutually exclusive or distinct from each other. Any or all elements of the embodiments of the invention described above may be combined or combined with each other in configuration or function.

For example, a configuration “A” described in one embodiment of the invention and the drawings and a configuration “B” described in another embodiment of the invention and the drawings may be combined with each other. Namely, although the combination between the configurations is not directly described, the combination is possible except in the case where it is described that the combination is impossible.

Although embodiments have been described with reference to a number of illustrative embodiments thereof, it should be understood that numerous other modifications and embodiments can be devised by those skilled in the art that will fall within the scope of the principles of this disclosure. More particularly, various variations and modifications are possible in the component parts and/or arrangements of the subject combination arrangement within the scope of the disclosure, the drawings and the appended claims. In addition to variations and modifications in the component parts and/or arrangements, alternative uses will also be apparent to those skilled in the art.

claim.claim-text: 1. A display device comprising:a display panel;a frame which is located in a rear of the display panel and to which the display panel is coupled;a substrate which is located between the display panel and the frame and which is coupled to the frame; anda plurality of light sources which are mounted on the substrate and which are spaced apart from each other,wherein the substrate comprises:a first plate which is elongated in a first direction; anda plurality of second plates which extend from the first plate in a second direction intersecting the first direction, and are spaced apart from each other in the first direction.

2. The display device of claim 1, further comprising:a heat sink which is located between the substrate and the frame, and which is coupled to the substrate and the frame,wherein the heat sink comprises a plurality of protrusions that protrudes from the heat sink toward the first plate and which penetrate the first plate.
3. The display device of claim 2, wherein the substrate comprises a plurality of substrates which are adjacent to each other while being spaced apart from each other.

4. The display device of claim 3, wherein the plurality of substrates comprises:a first substrate; anda second substrate adjacent to the first substrate,wherein a gap between the first substrate and the second substrate is formed in a direction parallel to the first substrate and the second substrate.

5. The display device of claim 4, wherein the plurality of protrusions comprises:a plurality of pins which protrude from the heat sink toward the first plate of the first substrate and which are spaced apart from each other,wherein the plurality of pins are adjacent to the gap and penetrate the first plate of the first substrate.

6. The display device of claim 5, wherein the heat sink comprises:a recessed portion which is formed in the heat sink while being recessed toward the frame,wherein the plurality of pins are formed in the recessed portion while being pressed toward the first substrate.

7. The display device of claim 5, wherein the first substrate comprises:a plurality of holes which are formed to penetrate the first plate of the first substrate, and into which corresponding ones of the plurality of pins are inserted,wherein a diameter of each of plurality of holes is substantially equal to a diameter of the corresponding ones of the plurality of pins.

8. The display device of claim 7, wherein the plurality of protrusions comprises:a plurality of bosses which protrude from the heat sink toward the first substrate and the second substrate, and which are spaced apart from each other in a length direction of the gap,wherein the first substrate comprises:a first side which faces the second substrate and which has a plurality of first grooves spaced apart from each other in the length direction of the gap,wherein the second substrate comprises:a second side which faces the first substrate and which has a plurality of second grooves spaced apart from each other in the length direction of the gap,wherein the plurality of bosses is inserted into corresponding positions between the first groove and the second groove.

9. The display device of claim 5, wherein the plurality of pins comprises:a first pin;a second pin spaced apart from the first pin; anda third pin opposite to the first pin with respect to the second pin,wherein the first substrate comprises:a first hole through which the first pin passes, and which is larger than the first pin in a direction in which the plurality of pins are spaced apart from each other;a second hole through which the second pin passes, and has a diameter substantially equal to that of the second pin; anda third hole through which the third pin passes, and which is larger than the third pin in a direction in which the plurality of pins are spaced apart from each other.

10. The display device of claim 3, further comprising:a plurality of reflective sheets which are respectively coupled to the plurality of substrates, and in which the plurality of light sources are located,wherein the plurality of protrusions penetrate the plurality of substrates and the plurality of reflective sheets sequentially.

11. The display device of claim 10, further comprising:a supporter located on at least one of the plurality of reflective sheets,wherein a part of the supporter penetrates the at least one of the plurality of reflective sheets and is fastened to the heat sink; anda diffuser plate which is located between the display panel and the at least one of the plurality of reflective sheets, and which is adjacent to or in contact with a front end of the supporter,wherein the supporter is located between the plurality of second plates.

12. The display device of claim 11,wherein the supporter extends in the second direction,wherein the supporter comprises:a fastening portion protruding from the supporter into and between the plurality of second plates;a first protrusion spaced apart from the fastening portion in a length direction of the supporter; anda second protrusion opposite to the first protrusion with respect to the fastening portion,wherein the heat sink comprises:a first slot equal to or larger than a diameter of the fastening portion;a second slot which is connected to the first slot in the length direction of the supporter and smaller than the diameter of the fastening portion;a first fixing hole into which the first protrusion is inserted; anda second fixing hole into which the second protrusion is inserted,wherein a portion between the supporter and the fastening portion is detachably caught in the second slot.

13. The display device of claim 10, further comprising:a side portion which extends along a circumference of the plurality of reflective sheets and which is disposed to be inclined toward the display panel with respect to the plurality of reflective sheets,wherein the side portion comprises a reflective material.

14. The display device of claim 13, further comprising:a horizontal reflection sheet which extends in the second direction and is located between the plurality of reflection sheets in the first direction.
15. The display device of claim 1, further comprising:a connector mounted on a rear surface of the first plate.
